channel.title: Can you help me?
channel.description:
Hello , i am flashsnake and i am here for with a problem ;D
Me and my friend have been playing runescape private servers for a long time , and after some time , servers usually get reseted / closed. Then all our stuff dissapears. And that makes me really mad. So i am asking you guys , can some one make me a runescape private server , because we want to play in a server that we know wont get closed or reseted.. whatever. I could pay some cash to the person who makes me the server , few months ago i tried to make a server , but i failed . Had problems , friends could not come in and idk.. i have a router so yes i can portforward Also i have some questions now :
Is my computer able to host the server ?
1.The computer is a dell latitude E6400 , with these specs :
CPU : Intel core 2 duo CPU p8400 , 2.26ghz RAM : 4GB And i think GPU ( video card ) doesent matter.
2. Is my internet fast enough ? Down 12mb/s ; Up 1mb/s
I would be very , very happy if some one would make me a private server. The one who would make me a server , could get some cash from me , and / or admin in my server. I think my server is going to be awesome , because i have a lot of experience. Please , help me ! ;) ;)
EDIT : You can make my private server , by using a tool named Teamviewer. With that tool you can control my computer and work on the server .

item.title: Can you help me?
item.dc:creator: @flashsnakz flashsnakz
item.description:
@flashsnakz wrote:

I should spend more than a week , getting my server up ? I even didnt get it up , so my friends can get on. I can add npcs , stuff and other things myself , i just want to get the server up so other people can come in.

And yes whattehp406 , i pmed you.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you help me?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“flashsnakz, post:5, topic:369049”]Why is home hosting crap ? I´can be home for the most of the time … so if it crashes i restart it ?
I tried to make the server for a week last time , also guy named " Epic Steve " helped me , did the auto portforward thing , because normal portforwarding didnt work for me , and idk how to do that again , it was quite hard. Then he said the server is ready , but no my friends couldnt get in. And then he ignored me. I tried to do all the guides , but still idk , is it my computer or what.[/quote]

You should spend longer than a week “making” your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you help me?
item.dc:creator: @flashsnakz flashsnakz
item.description:
@flashsnakz wrote:

Why is home hosting crap ? I´can be home for the most of the time … so if it crashes i restart it ?
I tried to make the server for a week last time , also guy named " Epic Steve " helped me , did the auto portforward thing , because normal portforwarding didnt work for me , and idk how to do that again , it was quite hard. Then he said the server is ready , but no my friends couldnt get in. And then he ignored me. I tried to do all the guides , but still idk , is it my computer or what.

Read full topic

if this post isent allowed please just tell and ill remove

item.description:

Or just post what the problem is, you’ll never learn if someone does it for you. Tell us what you’ve already done.
